CustomField.formula: AND(DoNotCall=false ,ISPICKVAL(Status,"Disqualified")=false ,ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c,'Bank Referral') = false ,ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,'Referral-Bank Referral') = false ,Referral_Contact__r.Has_Sensitivity_Payroll__c = false ,ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c,'Ecommerce') = false /*,DuplicatePhone_Pay__c = false */ ,Workable_Override__c = FALSE ,In_Cadence__c=FALSE ,(ISBLANK(amp_dev__Referral__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Hold_Out_Reason__c , 'Paychex Referral Network'))) ,AND(NOT(CONTAINS("NY:New York:New york:Newyork:ny::NEw York:NEWYORK:new york:Ny:NewYork:new York:NEW YORK", State))) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is this workable by the Payroll (Core or MMS) group in NSS?
CustomField.label: NSS Workable-Payroll
